refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ares mandol kamp, kfreq, kpluck, kdetune, kgain, ksize \ [, ifn] [, iminfreq]

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ifn -- table number containing the pluck wave form. The file mandpluk.aiff is suitable for this. It is also available at ftp://ftp.cs.bath.ac.uk/pub/dream/documentation/sounds/modelling/.
iminfreq (optional, default=0) -- Lowest frequency to be played on the note. If it is omitted it is taken to be the same as the initial kfreq.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kpluck -- The pluck position, in range 0 to 1. Suggest 0.4.
kdetune -- The proportional detuning between the two strings. Suggested range 0.9 to 1.
kgain -- the loop gain of the model, in the range 0.97 to 1.
ksize -- The size of the body of the mandolin. Range 0 to 2.
